sf_beta.h

1 #ifndef SF_BETA_H
2 #define SF_BETA_H 1
3 
4 #include <emsr/fp_type_util.h>
5 #include <emsr/detail/sf_beta.tcc>
6 
7 namespace emsr
8 {
9 
10  // Beta functions
11 
12  /**
13  * Return the beta function, @f$B(a,b)@f$, for real parameters
14  * @c a, @c b.
15  *
16  * The beta function is defined by
17  * @f[
18  * B(a,b) = \int_0^1 t^{a - 1} (1 - t)^{b - 1} dt
19  * = \frac{\Gamma(a)\Gamma(b)}{\Gamma(a+b)}
20  * @f]
21  * where @f$ a > 0 @f$ and @f$ b > 0 @f$
22  *
23  * @tparam _Tpa The floating-point type of the parameter @c a.
24  * @tparam _Tpb The floating-point type of the parameter @c b.
25  * @param a The first argument of the beta function, <tt> a > 0 </tt>.
26  * @param b The second argument of the beta function, <tt> b > 0 </tt>.
27  * @throw std::domain_error if <tt> a < 0 </tt> or <tt> b < 0 </tt>.
28  */
29  template<typename _Tpa, typename _Tpb>
30  inline emsr::fp_promote_t<_Tpa, _Tpb>
31  beta(_Tpa a, _Tpb b)
32  {
33  using type = emsr::fp_promote_t<_Tpa, _Tpb>;
34  return emsr::detail::beta<type>(a, b);
35  }
36 
37  // Incomplete beta functions
38 
39  /**
40  * Return the regularized incomplete beta function of parameters @c a, @c b,
41  * and argument @c x.
42  *
43  * The regularized incomplete beta function is defined by
44  * @f[
45  * I_x(a, b) = \frac{B_x(a,b)}{B(a,b)}
46  * @f]
47  * where
48  * @f[
49  * B_x(a,b) = \int_0^x t^{a - 1} (1 - t)^{b - 1} dt
50  * @f]
51  * is the non-regularized incomplete beta function and @f$ B(a,b) @f$
52  * is the usual beta function.
53  *
54  * @param a The first parameter
55  * @param b The second parameter
56  * @param x The argument
57  */
58  template<typename Ta, typename Tb, typename Tp>
59  inline emsr::fp_promote_t<Ta, Tb, Tp>
60  ibeta(Ta a, Tb b, Tp x)
61  {
62  using type = emsr::fp_promote_t<Ta, Tb, Tp>;
63  return emsr::detail::beta_inc<type>(a, b, x);
64  }
65 
66  // Complementary incomplete beta functions
67 
68  /**
69  * Return the regularized complementary incomplete beta function
70  * of parameters @c a, @c b, and argument @c x.
71  *
72  * The regularized complementary incomplete beta function is defined by
73  * @f[
74  * I_x(a, b) = I_x(a, b)
75  * @f]
76  *
77  * @param a The parameter
78  * @param b The parameter
79  * @param x The argument
80  */
81  template<typename Ta, typename Tb, typename Tp>
82  inline emsr::fp_promote_t<Ta, Tb, Tp>
83  ibetac(Ta a, Tb b, Tp x)
84  {
85  using type = emsr::fp_promote_t<Ta, Tb, Tp>;
86  return type(1) - emsr::ibeta<type>(a, b, x);
87  }
88 
89 } // namespace emsr
90 
91 #endif // SF_BETA_H
